ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_tgtop | |- ( B e. Top -> ( topGen ` B ) = B ) |

| 3 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( ( topGen ` B ) = B -> ( ( topGen ` B ) e. Top <-> B e. Top ) ) |
